sentences.sentence: Some intrepid individuals were still prepared to make the journey.
sentences.translation: 某些无畏的人仍然准备作此旅行。

sentences.sentence: Tomorrow the first of our intrepid tribe members arrive to play their part in the story.
sentences.translation: 明天，我们第一批勇敢的成员就要过来，在这儿的故事里扮演他们的角色。

sentences.sentence: Intrepid rally-drivers meet in Beijing for the start of the Peking to Paris Motor Challenge.
sentences.translation: 无畏的拉力赛选手相聚北京，参加北京到巴黎赛车挑战赛的开赛。
